headline: Assistant Chief Counsel, U.S. Immigrations and Customs Enforcement, Department of Homeland Security

defaultPosition.description: Represent the Department of Homeland Security in removal and deportation proceedings. Experience with the detained and non-detained settings. Draft motions and legal memoranda to further the government's position before the Immigration Court and the Board of Immigration Appeals. Previously embedded with NYC Fugitive Operations, Enforcement and Removal Operations. Provide legal advice and guidance in furtherance of targeted enforcement activities.
defaultPosition.title: Assistant Chief Counsel

positions.title: Assistant Chief Counsel

positions.companyName: United States Attorney's Office, Eastern District of New York
positions.description: Researched, drafted, and filed legal memoranda for pre-trial motions and on evidentiary issues. Reviewed trial records and transcripts. Observed courtroom proceedings.
positions.title: Summer Associate of the Civil Division

positions.description:
Previously an intern at Critical Mention, I worked my way up to an account executive in an up-and-coming media monitoring firm. I was responsible for my own lead generation, cold calling, and other aspects of the sales process.

I have experience in marketing and event planning, in addition to my current industry of media-related sales.
positions.title: Account Executive
